column1: Art Institute of Chicago////John Hughes references aside
column2: The Art Institute is full of fabulous treasures.You should be sure to visit the Thorne Minature Rooms gallery in the basement level. This is a little known collection of doll housed sized rooms ranging from the 1500s through the 1940s and spanning American
column4: and Asian cultures. They are works of painstaking detail and every time you view them you will see something new.
